title: MD
biography: Classroom 8 is a 2023 Peruvian documentary film written, produced, filmed, edited and directed by Héctor Gálvez. It follows a school teacher Víctor Zapata Farro and his way of educating his students in the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic.
aiSummary: Hector Galvez is a pediatrics specialist with an H-index of 16 at National Institute of Child Health Peru (Member). Has been published in Cells. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
education: National Institute of Child Health Peru
